fitness_verdict:
🏰 BUNKER: Low complexity, high resilience. The ideal state.

Recommended Action: Maintain current practices. Consider if any resilience measures are redundant.

complexity_analysis.verdict: Complexity is within acceptable bounds but trending toward excess. Monitor during future development and address hotspots proactively.
recommendations: WARNING: 1179 lines per function point suggests over-engineering. Industry standard is ~50.
NOTE: High token entropy may indicate inconsistent naming or overly complex logic.
NOTE: High compression ratio indicates redundant code. Look for copy-paste patterns to abstract.

vulnerabilities.message: 1 network calls may lack timeout configuration
